title: Starry Night
description: A magnificent post-impressionist masterpiece, depicting a dreamy night sky over a quiet town.

title: The Persistence of Memory
description: This surreal artwork is best known for its melting clocks, symbolizing the fluidity of time.

title: The Great Wave off Kanagawa
description: A celebrated Japanese woodblock print, depicting a dramatic wave about to crash.

title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
description: Known as the 'Mona Lisa of the North,' this painting captures a young girl with a striking gaze.

title: The Scream
description: A haunting expressionist painting, evoking feelings of existential dread and anxiety.
